title: What stands out about Daniel Craig's James Bond compared to past members who played the role? - Quora

response.answer_text: Daniel Craig's James Bond is very pro-active compared to previous Bond actors. He is less often in bed and more often climbing and leaping from scaffolding in some third world location.

He is a very human Bond, first seen before he was a “00”, brutal and thuggish. he matured into his job almost throwing the job away after finding love. He takes a while to mend his wounds, like we do. Human.
